name: little BEETLE bottle BATTLE
description:
Instructions:

Step 1: prepare your BOTTLE for BATTLE (click and drag to swap tiles and make matches).

Step 2: Recruit BEETLES for BATTLE (use the recruit menu on the left). You must recruit new BEETLES for each BATTLE since you START with...fewer resources than before. 

Step 3: Repeat

Credits:

- I'm AP Thomson! I made this game for Ludum Dare 45. Click on my website (apthomson.com) or observe me on the internet (https://twitter.com/bad_tetris)

- Fonts are by Chevy Ray and you can buy them here: https://chevyray.itch.io/pixel-fonts

Tips: 

- Prepare your terrain carefully. BEETLES have a hard time moving across MOUNTAIN and, as dictated by scripture, no BEETLE may walk on WATER. 

- The BEETLES you can recruit are: 

1. Farmers: Will gather FOOD from FIELD

2. Soldiers: Will engage in BEETLE BATTLE

3. Miners: Will gather ROCK from MOUNTAIN

4. Lumberjacks: Will gather WOOD from FOREST

5. Archers: Will engage in BEETLE BATTLE from a SAFE distance.

- When you are relatively safe, prioritize gathering RESOURCE. 

~~~~~~~KIDZ KORNER ~~~~~~~

Little BEETLE bottle BATTLE features BATTLE and is therefore NOT for KIDS. Instead, please enjoy this CONNECT THE DOTS to draw your own BEETLE (connect the dots might not work on every browser or OS).
